mapper.select: select id , content ,regDate , 'FreeDiary' as diary from FreeDiary where memberId = #{param1} union all select id , content ,regDate, 'FutureDiary' as diary from FutureDiary where memberId = #{param1} union all select id , content1 ,regDate, 'GratitudeDiary' as diary from GratitudeDiary where memberId = #{param1} order by regDate DESC;

select id , content ,regDate , 'FreeDiaryComment' as "comment" from FreeDiaryComment where memberId = #{param1} union all select id , content ,regDate, 'FutureDiaryComment' as "comment" from FutureDiaryComment where memberId = #{param1} union all select id , content ,regDate, 'GratitudeDiaryComment' as "comment" from GratitudeDiaryComment where memberId = #{param1} order by regDate DESC;
